channel.title: Shadows - [Main Thread]
channel.description:
The city of Jaran. A modern city in a country name Liesan. It has been peaceful, crime rates low and a booming economy. People come in and out every day, as the busy hustle of the city rushed along.
And everyone continues on their daily work...

item.title: Shadows - [Main Thread]
item.dc:creator: Marluxion
item.description:
“I wouldn’t be so sure. I’ve got a bad feeling about this… Oh well.” The trio head to the address on the hotel’s card in Yulan’s car. (@Shurian )

Read full topic

item.title: Shadows - [Main Thread]
item.dc:creator: TrustworthyLiberal
item.description:
“Well would it be any safer here after all this is where the one I saw was.
After all if an with you two am more likely to be safe anyway. Wait am i gonna have to go into the back seat it’s not one of those ones that locks you in right?”
Yumo follows behind them towards the car.

Read full topic

item.title: Shadows - [Main Thread]
item.dc:creator: Marluxion
item.description:
"… It’s possible it’s dangerous. I’ve been investigating the local disappearances recently and it’s possible this is connected. If you still Insist on coming, knowing that, I won’t stop you from joining us. Let’s go. " Daigo motions for Yulan to follow him to the car.

Read full topic

item.title: Shadows - [Main Thread]
item.dc:creator: TrustworthyLiberal
item.description:
“Well didn’t the monocrome thing give the address to me? Maybe i could catch a ride with you two to the hotel cause i think it would be a long walk to do alone. If not that’s… okay should only take a few hours to get there.”

Read full topic

item.title: Shadows - [Main Thread]
item.dc:creator: Magnus
item.description:
Arthur-Oliver remained conspicuously silent, hearing his all the ideas and quotes given by his companions and keeping them in mind. He wasn’t asleep, that was obvious; he didn’t need to pinch himself or anything. If this had been in his own head, anyway, he’d be on his own.

Read full topic

item.title: Shadows - [Main Thread]
item.dc:creator: min
item.description:
“…Maybe you shouldn’t do drugs…”

Read full topic

item.title: Shadows - [Main Thread]
item.dc:creator: Marluxion
item.description:
“One earlier outside of the hospital. And just now here on this rooftop… Let’s get going, Yulan. The address on this hotel’s card isn’t too far from here. You drive.” Daigo stops and turns to Kumo. “Do you need us to drop you off somewhere? What are you planning to do?” (@TrustworthyLiberal )

Read full topic

item.title: Shadows - [Main Thread]
item.dc:creator: TrustworthyLiberal
item.description:
Kumo nods her head

“Yeah I saw one… in my room as I woke up yeah it was scarely close looking to me. Wait have you two seen one before as well then?”

Read full topic

item.title: Shadows - [Main Thread]
item.dc:creator: Intensify
item.description:
Shurian:

“Well well, my dear wonderful guests I’ve invited from the that world. Welcome to the gateway between worlds.”

“Oh goodness the drugs are kicking in again, dammit I thought the herbalist said these ones don’t make me hallucinate weird noises,” Omi worryingly says.

Read full topic

item.title: Shadows - [Main Thread]
item.dc:creator: WindwardAway
item.description:
It’s unclear where the voice came from, but Taisto sees the others pause to listen to it as well. “A gateway between worlds, huh?” he repeats, furrowing his brow. “What the hell is that supposed to mean?”

Read full topic

item.title: Shadows - [Main Thread]
item.dc:creator: min
item.description:
“Hello there?”

Read full topic

item.title: Shadows - [Main Thread]
item.dc:creator: Shurian
item.description:
Magnus:

“It was indeed,” Arthur-Oliver muttered. “I’m thinking we need to get out of this Hotel.”

WindwardAway:

“Yeah,” Taisto agrees, glancing around the hall. “We do, but there’s something I want to do before we leave.”
He keeps it vague, still not mentioning the phone call. But before he can be interrogated by Arthur-Oliver, he sees the other two now at the end of the hallway. “Looks like they decided to join us, after all,” he comments.

Intensify:

“Is that a furry?” Omi says as he walks closer towards the “beastperson”.

min:

“…um.”

He awkwardly stares into the distance.

Said beastperson only had beast ears and a bushy wolf tail… not exactly the someone who has an animal face and claws…

“Well well, my dear wonderful guests I’ve invited from the that world. Welcome to the gateway between worlds.”

A voice reckons out in the hallway. Echoing from all directions… before Koral could walk off. (@Ami)

Read full topic

item.title: Shadows - [Main Thread]
item.dc:creator: Shurian
item.description:
Marluxion:

Daigo stops in the doorway. “Hotel card? Let me see it.” Daigo takes the card from Kumo and examines it, front to back. (@Shurian)

@TrustworthyLiberal

Shurian:

And where it once was, is a hotel card. A brand new one, seemingly untouched

Shurian:

And yet, there is an address on the hotel card. There is no other numbers to take note of, not even a phone number.

Just as Daigo takes a look at the card… he notes that the address is in a rundown part of town. Quite close from the abandoned building they were in.

“Monochrome? Those lookalikes, you saw them too?” Yulan addresses the girl…

Read full topic

“Yeah,” Taisto agrees, glancing around the hall. “We do, but there’s something I want to do before we leave.”
He keeps it vague, still not mentioning the phone call. But before he can be interrogated by Arthur-Oliver, he sees the other two now at the end of the hallway. “Looks like they decided to join us, after all,” he comments.

item.title: Shadows - [Main Thread]
item.dc:creator: WindwardAway
item.description:
Ami:

“Don’t know where, don’t know when, but we’ll meet again some sunny day” They mock salute before walking off

Taisto is quiet as his companion does the talking for a spell. As Koral leaves, he raises a hand in a brief wave, watching as they carry the slumbering wolf lady. “Well…” he finally turns to Arthur-Oliver, “…that was interesting.”

Read full topic

item.description:
Arthur-Oliver nodded, the answer similar enough to what he’d been expecting. “Well, good luck with whatever it is, Koral. Maybe we’ll meet again.”

item.title: Shadows - [Main Thread]
item.dc:creator: Ami
item.description:
They pause, figuring out an answer that doesn’t rouse suspicion “If I told you, I’d have to kill you” They then laugh a bit at their own joke. “Nah, I’m kidding about that part.”
